org.webcurator.domain
Interface SchedulePatternFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpringSchedulePatternFactory
public interface SchedulePatternFactory

An interface for the Schedule Pattern Factory. This allows us to abstract the source of the patterns. The first release of the WCT will extract the schedule patterns from the Spring configuration. Later releases may move the patterns to the database.

Author:
bbeaumont
